biography.value: Goblins are small, black-hearted humanoids that lair in despoiled dungeons and other dismal settings. Individually weak, they gather in large numbers to torment other creatures.

description.value: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.
A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Nimble Escape. The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Spellcasting. Grenl is a 1st-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): &Reference[poison]{poison} spray, thaumaturgy

1st level (2 slots): bane, inflict wounds

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm. The creature must succeed on a &Reference[con]{Constitution} saving throw or take 1d12 &Reference[poison]{poison} damage.

This spell's damage increases by 1d12 when you reach 5th level (2d12), 11th level (3d12), and 17th level (4d12).

You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range. You create one of the following magical effects within range:

  • Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute.
  • You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.
  • You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.
  • You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of &Reference[thunder]{thunder}, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.
  • You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.
  • You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.


If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make &Reference[cha]{Charisma} saving throws. Whenever a target that fails this saving throw makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 &Reference[necrotic]{necrotic} damage.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st.
